DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this project is to confirm the efficacy and safety profile of Insulin glargine in daily practice and to improve the physicians' knowledge and experience concerning Insulin glargine
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus patients, Diabetic patients receiving insulin or patients who are insulinnaive and whose glycemic control cannot be sufficiently maintained with single or combined oral antidiabetic agents, Patients with HbA1C>8 Patients able to selfmeasure its blood glucose levels. According to package insert information (Summary of Product Characteristics)
